title: Watch: Sharjah Police cracks down on 8 drivers for dangerous driving stunts during rain, seize vehicles
summary_full: Sharjah Police have launched a severe crackdown on drivers performing dangerous stunts during rainfall, impounding vehicles and penalising eight individuals. This action highlights the UAE's commitment to road safety, with hefty fines, black points and vehicle confiscation for reckless behaviour that endangers lives. Authorities urge public cooperation in reporting unsafe driving.
